name: frontendmentor.io Projects
description: Created a collection of frontend projects as part of the challenges on frontendmentor.io, showcasing various web development skills, practices and standards. These projects includes a range of responsive designs based from a figma-created design system. Each project demonstrates attention to detail, adherence to best coding practices, and usage of traditional and modern web technologies such as Sass, Tailwind, Pug, Vue and React
